mapper.select: select * from logo_reply inner join logo_user using(user_id) where board_id = #{board_id} and reply_show = 1
mapper.insert: insert into logo_reply (reply_id, board_id, reply_content, user_id, created_at) values (reply_id_seq.nextval, #{board_id}, #{reply_content}, #{user_id}, systimestamp)
mapper.update: update logo_reply set reply_show = 0 where reply_id = #{reply_id}
